name: unfun
description:
Submission to Godot Wild Jam #30.

  • Game loosely inspired by heartbeat theme and heart rate monitor sounds and visuals
  • Visuals intentionally lacking due to wildcard theme and my non-existent art skills
  • Leaderboards hosted by SilentWolf, check them out
  • Sound effects are public domain assets
  • The performance might not be great on older machines

Survive as long as possible by avoiding red zones.
Controls: AWD, ←↑→
